title: MUREX - Send Murex ID file to CID

task_list.instruction_title:
Please provide MUREX ID to CID Team

The Murex ID will be shared as a CSV file via email. The fileds to be included in the file are:

A) Murex ID

B) GID (SocGen ID)

C) Counterparty

D) Counterparty type

E) UTI

Please provide MUREX ID to IT T&T Team

The Murex ID will be shared as a CSV file via email. The fileds to be included in the file are:

A) Murex ID

B) GID (SocGen ID)

C) Counterparty

D) Counterparty type

E) UTI
